name: Royal belgian Institute of natural Sciences (RBINS)
tagline: Presentation of the Royal belgian Insitute of natural Sciences
body:
# Welcome to GitHub Page of the Royal belgian Institute of natural Sciences.

The Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences is one of the ten federal scientific establishments that are governed by the Belgian Science Policy Office (Belspo). It is involved in important scientific research activities and carries out public service missions. It is open to everyone through the Museum of Natural Sciences.

We're glad to present you the different github projects we're working on and we're distributing:

* DaRWIN 2: an open source web base tool to manage your Natural Sciences collection
* Status pages: a Jekyll generated blog informing our user of any real-time failure in our infrastructure.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
